name: Gearcrack Arena
summary: GEARCRACK Arena was designed to put you under heavy fire on 2 clicks. With no fillers you will put your strategy and reflexes to the test since the first seconds of game. Create your gameplay style and upgrade your favorite class. Core distorted guitars, heavy beat and 90´s dark sci-fi hue will join you on the quest of surviving 9 waves of Specters, Marauders and SACI Sentinels. Enemies will use fuzzy logics and different classes to try stopping you on this cyberpunk topdown arena adventure. Game goes with the original soundtrack mp3 album to keep you rocking on your way out.
